title: Calling Don Hosek
content:
{I need the forum as a channel for resolving a certain issue - sorry.}   
   
Dear Mr Hosek,   
Normal channels of communication have failed. The last time this   
happened, a post to Typo-L succeeded in getting through to you,   
but this time that hasn't worked either, so I am now trying this   
forum, hoping to get a refund on Serif, which has not shipped an   
issue in about three years.   
   
This past September you wrote on Typo-L: "I'll give refunds to   
the impatient"\*. I declared myself as impatient and asked for a   
refund. I was advised on September 26 that the refund has been   
issued but it would take upto two billing cycles. It's now been   
about four cycles, and still nothing. Could you please let me   
know what to expect? Is there perhaps some information   
I could throw at my bank?   
   
\* [http://listserv.heanet.ie/cgi-bin/wa?A2=ind0209&L=typo-l&D=0&T=0&P=12097](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021234811/http:/listserv.heanet.ie/cgi-bin/wa?A2=ind0209&L=typo-l&D=0&T=0&P=12097)   
   
Sincerely,   
Hrant Papazian   
   
   
Ref: [http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/2509.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021234811/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/2509.html)
